name: The Bunker - Director's Cut
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

The exclusive Director's Cut of THE BUNKER, the apocalyptic horror FMV now cut into a Steam-only movie. Edited by director and creator Allan Plenderleith, the movie follows the darkest path which John can take through the sinister bunker - unlocking suppressed memories, revealing the horrific truth about the bunker, and what really went on down there. John is about to discover he is not entirely innocent...
about_the_game: The exclusive Director's Cut of THE BUNKER, the apocalyptic horror FMV now cut into a Steam-only movie.  Edited by director and creator Allan Plenderleith, the movie follows the darkest path which John can take through the sinister bunker - unlocking suppressed memories, revealing the horrific truth about the bunker, and what really went on down there.  John is about to discover he is not entirely innocent...
short_description: The Director's Cut of the award-winning FMV game The Bunker, by creator and director Allan Plenderleith.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

content_descriptors.notes: Scene of repairing broken arm, dead bodies, sick patients, some blood and gore.
